processors.name: Add Some Garbage to the Filename to Avoid Conflicts
Initializer
processors.comments:
A processor to use and then turn off before it fires again. You have approximately 68 years for that, so I believe you can do this, dear administrator.

Sorry for the ugliness of it, but that's the best solution I found so far on the Stack Overflow and Chat's halucinating.

Oh, you can apparently click "run once" and that works too.
